舞亜が俺を呼び出すなんて珍しいな。\n一体なんの用事なんだ？:
It's rare for Maia to summon me.
What the hell are you doing here?
来てくれてありがとうね。\n単刀直入に言うけど……私とデートをしてもらいたんだ。:
Thank you for coming.
I'll get straight to the point... She went on a date with me.
……単刀直入にもほどがあるぞ。: ...There's a limit to how straightforward you can get.
ふふ、%usernameusernameuserna%がそんな風に、\n驚いてい:
Hehe, %usernameusernameuserna% is like that,
It might be rare to see her look surprised.
いや、それよりもデートに関しての説明を頼む……: No, more importantly, please explain about the date...
ごめんごめん。話を端折りすぎたわね。: Sorry, sorry. I got a little too caught up in the conversation.
実は、知り合いの子から相談を受けたの。\nそれ自体はよくあることなんだけど、内容:
Actually, I was consulted by a girl I know.
That's pretty common in and of itself, but the content is...
いつも葵をフォローしてチームを支えている舞亜なら、\n悩み相談くらいお手の物だと:
Maia, who was always backing Aoi up and supporting the team, could do it
I think she's pretty good at consulting people about their problems...
その子、気になる異性がいるんだって。\nで、今度その相手を遊びに誘ってみるらしい:
She said there's a girl of the opposite sex she's interested in.
So, it seems she's going to invite that person to hang out sometime.
当日に備えてデートの参考になる情報を求められたんだけど、\n生憎、私もその手の経:
I was asked for information that would be useful as a reference for our date in preparation for the day, but...
Unfortunately, I don't have any experience with that sort of thing.
恋愛相談か。責任重大だな……: Love advice, huh? That's a lot of responsibility...
でしょ？ 経験もないのに適当なアドバイスをして、\nご破算にしちゃうわけにもいか:
Isn't that right? Even though I don't have any experience, I give her some appropriate advice
I can't afford to ruin it.
それで俺に助言を求めにきたのか。\nあまりアテにならないと思うぞ。:
Is that why she came to me for advice?
I don't think I'll be able to rely on you much.
%usernameusernameuserna%に丸投げするつもりはないわ。\n:
I'm not going to throw it all at %usernameusernameuserna%.
I tried to come up with a date plan in my own way.
でも、こういうことって男性の意見も重要でしょ？\nだから『実践』の相手をお願いし:
But men's opinions are important in this kind of thing, aren't they?
That's why I wanted to ask you to be my "practice" partner.
実践……要するに、お試しでデートしてくれってことか？: Practice... So basically, you're asking me to go on a date as a test?
呑み込みが早くて助かるわ。\nそれに、頼める男の子は%usernameusern:
I'm glad you're so quick to swallow.
Besides, the only boy I could ask for was %usernameusernameuserna%.
それで、どう？\nお試しのデートに付き合って貰えるかしら？:
So, how's it going?
Would you be willing to accompany me on a trial date?
約束の時間まで、ちょっと余裕があるな……\n舞亜が来るのはまだ先か……ん？:
There's a bit of leeway until the appointed time...
It's still a while before Maia arrives... Hm?
――まだ集合の１５分前よ？\nちょっと到着するには早いんじゃないかしら？:
――It's still fifteen minutes before we meet up.
Isn't it a little early to be arriving?
舞亜こそ。\n……というか、どれくらい待ったんだ？:
You too, Maia.
...Wait, how long have we been waiting?
私のことは気にしないで。\n誘った方がルーズじゃ困るでしょ？:
Don't worry about me.
Wouldn't it be more troublesome if I invited you?
じゃ、早速行きましょ。\nまずはコンテンポラリー・アートの個展からね。:
Okay, let's get going.
Let's start with a contemporary art exhibition.
コンテンポラリー……現代美術か？\n全然詳しくないんだが、ついていけるかな。:
Contemporary... contemporary art?
I don't know much about it, but I wonder if I'll be able to keep up.
ふふ。知識は仕入れてきたから、ガイドはご心配なく。: Hehe. I've got all the knowledge I need, so don't worry about the guide.
ダンボールや紙細工で、あんな色々表現できるものなんだな。: I didn't know cardboard and paperwork could express so many things like that.
ここ数年、話題のアーティストだそうよ。\n童話や戯曲を題材に、１００を超える作品:
He's been the talk of the town for years.
He wrote over a hundred works based on fairy tales and plays.
館内の作品もすごいが、舞亜の補足と解説も、\nそれに負けないくらい面白かったな…:
The works in the complex were amazing, but Maia's additions and commentary were also impressive
It was just as interesting as that...
ふふ、楽しんでいただけて何よりね。次は映画館へ行きましょ。\nちょうど、面白い映:
Haha, I'm glad you enjoyed it. Let's go to the movie theater next.
There's an interesting movie showing right now.
展示を見終えたばかりで、もう移動するのか？: We've only just finished looking at the display. Are we going to move now?
のんびり歩けば、１０分前に到着するわ。\nだから、さっきの美術館の話をしながら歩:
If you walk around leisurely, you'll arrive ten minutes early.
So let's walk around talking about the museum, okay?
あ、ああ。\nしっかりタイムスケジュールまで考えられてるんだな……:
Y-Yeah.
She's really thinking about her time schedule...
いや、いい映画だった……: No, it was a good movie...
思った以上に映画が盛況でびっくりしたわね。\n前もって席を準備しておかなかったら:
The movie was a lot more popular than I expected. I was surprised.
I might not have been able to see it if I hadn't prepared a seat ahead of time.
舞亜が選んでくれなかったら見る事もなかっただろうな。\nありがとう、いい映画が楽:
If Maia hadn't chosen it, I probably wouldn't have seen it.
Thank you. I enjoyed the movie.
ふふ、それならよかったわ。\nでも、まだまだ終わりじゃないわよ？:
Heehee. I'm glad to hear that.
But it's not over yet, you know?
まだ他に見るものがあるのか？: Is there anything else you want to see?
よいしょっと……\nここの公園からの景色、とっても素敵なのよ。\n夕暮れなんて、:
Here we go...
The view from the park here is wonderful.
Sunsets are especially beautiful.
なるほど。確かに……こんなきれいな風景を見て、\n静かに過ごす時間も悪くないな。:
I see. It's true... seeing such a beautiful scenery...
Spending time in peace isn't so bad.
%usernameusernameuserna%は、\n休日どんなふうに過ごして:
%usernameusernameuserna%...
How do you spend your days off?
これといって決まった過ごし方はないな。\n仲間と遊んだり、訓練の復習をしたり、あ:
Even so, there's no fixed way to pass the time.
Playing with my friends, reviewing my training, and then going to the arcade...
ゲーセン？ いいわね。\n今度、私も連れていってよ。:
The arcade? Sounds good.
Next time, take me with you.
構わないけど、それなら今度と言わず今からでも……: I don't mind, but if that's the case, I won't have to ask next time...
今日行っちゃったら、次のデートの楽しみを潰しちゃうじゃない？\nそれよりも今は、:
If you go today, you'll ruin the fun of our next date, won't you?
More importantly, I want to enjoy the view from here.
ああ、なるほど。\n次のデートプランを決めるまでが舞亜のプランなのか。:
Ah, I see.
Was Maia's plan until she decided on her next date plan?
確かに、次回のデートの約束を取り付けるために\nきっかけを考えておくのは大事かも:
Indeed, in order to get a promise for the next date
It might be important to think of an opportunity. But...
ここのカフェのデザートがお勧めなの。\nこれで今日のデートプランは終了……どうか:
I recommend the desserts at this café.
That's all for today's date plan... What do you think?
なるほど、よく考えられてる。\n初めてのデートとしては無難で、ある意味完璧かもし:
I see. She's really thinking about it.
It's safe for our first date, and in a way, it might be perfect.
つまり……%usernameusernameuserna%的にはだめだったのね？:
In other words... %usernameusernameuserna% couldn't do it, right?
...What was wrong with the date?
なんていうか……計画的すぎて余白がない、\nという感じかな……:
How do I put this...? It's so planned that there's no room for error,
I guess that's how it is...
学生同士のデートって、もっとこう、\n上手くいかないことも多いもんじゃないか？:
A date between students would be more like this,
Isn't there a lot of things that don't go well?
そうかもしれないけど、相談してきた子に失敗させて\nイヤな思いをさせるわけにもい:
That might be true, but let the girl who came to me for advice fail
I can't make her feel bad.
失敗を笑い合ったり、回り道やムダを楽しんだり、\nそういうのも含めた初々しさもデ:
They laughed at each other's failures, and enjoyed detours and wastes
I think her innocence is part of the fun of going on a date.
デート経験なんかないって言いつつ、\nソツなくまとめてきた舞亜はすごいと思ったよ:
Even though she said she didn't have any date experience,
I thought Maia was amazing for putting it all together so smoothly. But...
せっかく練ってくれた計画を\n根本から否定するような意見で悪いんだが。:
I want to know the plan you worked so hard to come up with
I'm sorry for denying it from the bottom of my heart.
……そっか。\n一旦学園に戻って考え直さないとね！:
...I see.
We'll have to go back to the academy and reconsider!
今日は付き合ってくれてありがとう。\n%usernameusernameuser:
Thank you for going out with me today.
Thanks to %usernameusernameuserna%, I was really saved.
（これで解散って雰囲気だな。でも……）: (Now it feels like we're disbanding. But...)
計画的とか完璧すぎるって俺の指摘のことなら、\nあまり気にするな。:
If it's something I point out as too planned or too perfect,
Don't worry about it too much.
こっちのデートに対する考え方だって、\n正直アテになるようなもんじゃない。:
Even my way of thinking about dates...
Honestly, it's not something I can rely on.
学園に戻る前からちょっと様子が変だったからな。\n今も空元気に見えるぞ？:
She was acting a little strange even before we got back to school.
You still look empty, don't you?
やりすぎちゃうんだ。\n勉強でもスポーツでもなんでも。:
You're going too far.
Studying, sports, anything.
『やりすぎ』……確かカフェでもそう言ってたな。: "It's too much"... I'm pretty sure she said that at the café, too.
私ばっかり前に進んで、気付いたら周りのみんなは辞めちゃう。\nお前にはついて行け:
I'm the only one who moves forward, and before I know it, everyone around me quits.
I can't keep up with you. It's not fun.
本当は一緒に楽しくやりたかっただけなんだけどね……: Honestly, I just wanted to have fun with you...
だから進学してからは、\n省エネスタイルでやっていくことにしたんだけどさ。:
That's why, after I went to college,
I decided to do it in an energy-saving style.
まさか今さら、デートでも同じ轍を踏んじゃうなんてね。\n私らしいといえば私らしい:
I didn't think I'd make the same mistake on a date now.
It's very much like me, though.
……俺の腹め。何もこんなタイミングで鳴ることはないだろ……: ...My stomach. There's no need to cry at a time like this...
そういえば、カフェでデートを中断しちゃったものね。\nもしまだ時間があるなら、つ:
Come to think of it, we stopped our date at the café.
If you still have time, come with me.
柊校舎の食堂に連れてきてくれた舞亜は、\nそのままエプロンを付けて調理場に立ち…:
Maia, who had brought me to the Hiiragi school cafeteria...
I put on my apron and stood in the kitchen...
って、もしかして舞亜が料理を作ってくれるのか？: Wait, is Maia going to cook for me?
ちょくちょく調理実習室を借りて作ってるから。\nカラフルブーケのみんなにご馳走す:
I borrow the cooking practice room from time to time to make it.
To treat everyone at the colorful bouquet.
普段から葵達に手料理を振る舞ってるのか？: Do you usually cook for Aoi and the others?
ときどきね。たまに準備を手伝ってもらうこともあるの。\nせいぜいお皿出しとか、テ:
Every now and then, I'd ask her to help me prepare.
At most, I'd have them serve plates or wipe the table.
みんなといるとドタバタしちゃうこともあるけど、\nそういう賑やかなのが楽しくて―:
When I'm with everyone, I can get a little flustered, but...
That kind of liveliness was so much fun—
計画とか考えず、失敗してもいいから\n同じ目線で一緒に楽しむんだ。デートと同じさ:
You don't have to think of a plan. You can fail.
We're going to look at each other the same way. It's the same as a date.
あ……そっか。そうだよね。\nこんな簡単なことでよかったんだ。:
Oh... I see. You're right.
I'm glad it was this simple.
とっくに気付いていたはずなのに、\nすっかり忘れちゃってたんだなぁ、私。:
She should have realized it by now, but...
I must have completely forgotten.
デートの相談してきた子に、\n参考になるアドバイスをしてあげられそうだな。:
To the girl who came to me for advice on our date...
Looks like I can give you some useful advice.
だね。でもその前に……\nまずは私達の食事の時間を楽しみましょ。:
Yeah. But before that...
Let's enjoy our meal time first.
改めて、%usernameusernameuserna%の意見を聞いておかないと:
I need to hear %usernameusernameuserna%'s opinion again.
I hope it suits your tastes.
期待させてもらうさ。胃袋の準備は万端だしな。: I'll look forward to it. My stomach's all ready.
どう……かな？\n味付けはちょっと濃いめにしてみたんだけど。:
What do you think...?
I tried making the seasoning a little stronger.
ホントに？ よかった。\nやっぱり男の子には薄味じゃ物足りないもんね。:
Really? Thank goodness.
A light flavor isn't enough for a boy, after all.
カフェで食べてこなかったのは、結果的に正解だったな。: I guess not eating at the café was the right answer in the end.
ふふ、それは褒めすぎよ。\nそんなお店と比べられるほどじゃないわ。:
Haha, that's too much praise.
It's nothing compared to a place like that.
率直な感想を言ったまでさ。\nああ、それと――:
I was just being honest.
Oh, and—
どうしたの？\nさすがにデザートは出ないけど……:
What's wrong with you?
Of course, dessert doesn't come out, but...
デートの実践テストに限らず、俺が相手の時は\nやり過ぎを気にする必要はないからな:
It's not just the practical exams for dating, but when I'm with someone
There's no need to worry about going too far, after all.
恋愛相談の助言を求められたから率直な感想を言ったけど、\n舞亜の今日のデートプラ:
She asked me for advice on love advice, so I gave her my honest opinion, but...
I don't hate Maia's date plan at all.
というか、むしろ楽しめたぞ。\nだから舞亜が自重する必要なんてないからな。:
Actually, it was actually fun.
That's why there's no need for Maia to restrain herself.
葵が、今の俺と似たようなことを？: Aoi did something similar to me right now?
うん……私がやりすぎても構わないって。\nありのままを受け入れて、友達でいてくれ:
Yeah... I don't mind if I overdo it.
She's the kind of girl who accepts things as they are and stays friends with them.
……そうか。\n葵は大切な存在なんだな。舞亜にとって。:
...I see.
Aoi is important to Maia, isn't she?
うん、そうだよ。\n葵は私の大切な友達で……眩しい憧れなんだ。:
Yeah, that's right.
Aoi is a precious friend of mine... A dazzling yearning.
……気が向いたら、葵とのことをもっと深く聞かせてくれ。\n次のデートの機会でもい:
...If you feel like it, tell me more about Aoi.
We can go on our next date.
ふふっ。考えておくね。\nまたデートするかどうかも含めて。:
Hehe. I'll think about it.
Including whether or not we're going on another date.
でもその代わり、%usernameusernameuserna%の話も聞かせても:
But in exchange, I'll tell you about %usernameusernameuserna%.
The rumored commander.
葵によく似たことを言うあなたが、どんな人なのか……\n以前よりも気になってきたか:
I don't know what kind of person you are, saying something so similar to Aoi...
I'm even more curious about it than before.
なんでも聞いてくれ。\n大して面白い話は出てこないと思うけどな。:
Ask me anything.
I don't think there'll be any interesting stories coming up, though.
葵って言ったらどうする？: What would you do if I said Aoi?
じゃあ……最初の質問。\n%usernameusernameuserna%の好み:
Then... my first question.
What kind of woman is %usernameusernameuserna%' type?
理想って……ふふっ、そこまで言う？\nもしかして、からかわれたのかしら？:
Ideals...? Hehe, are you really going to go that far?
Maybe she was just teasing me?
デートだったら、率直に答えてあげるのが正解だろ？: If it's a date, isn't it the right choice to give her a frank answer?
……ありがとう、お世辞でも嬉しいわ。\n本当のデートで言われたら、ドキドキしちゃ:
...Thank you. Even if it's flattery, I'm happy.
If she said that on a real date, my heart might race.
まあ、俺はお試しの相手だからな。\nドキドキは本当のデートの時に取っておく方がい:
Well, I'm a test subject.
It's better to save your excitement for when you're on a real date.
ふぅん……それって私をからかってる？\n葵を取られたら、どんな反応をするかって。:
Hmm... Are you teasing me?
How she'd react if Aoi was taken.
からかうような質問をしてきたのは、舞亜の方だろ？: Maia was the one who asked me a teasing question, wasn't she?
ほら、またそうやって。\nそんな程度じゃ、俺は動揺しないぞ。:
See, you're doing that again.
That's not enough to shake me.
ふふっ。さすがね、優秀な指揮官さん。: Hehe. That's a good commander for you.
他に何か聞きたいことはあるか？: Is there anything else you want to ask?
今日のところは、これで遠慮しておこうかな。\n１度で全部聞いちゃうのはもったいな:
I think I'll pass for today.

……だから、またいつかデートに誘うわ。\n続きはその時に、ゆっくり教えてね？:
...So I'll ask you out on another date someday.
Let me know when you're done, okay?
